synopsis.text: Anastasia Palma, a talented Greek actress, joins the newly formed Imperial Combat Revue's Flower Division in Tokyo, led by Captain Kamiyama Seijuurou of the Imperial Japanese Navy. Alongside her are Sakura Amamiya, a skilled swordswoman; Hatsuho Shinonome, a popular actress and shrine maiden; Azami Mochizuki, a ninja prodigy from the Mochizuki clan; and Clarissa 'Clarise' Snowflake, a Luxembourgian noblewoman. The team must protect Tokyo from a new demon invasion while participating in the biennial international Combat Revue tournament and trying to keep their home at the Imperial Theater open. This anime is a soft reboot of the Sakura Taisen (Sakura Wars) series and is based on Sega Games's cross-genre video game Shin Sakura Taisen.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
